entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
